body:
### Problem

Building neovim from master fail with error:
```sh
-- Found GNU Make at /usr/bin/make
-- CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr
-- CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RelWithDebInfo
-- Using Lua interpreter: /usr/bin/luajit
-- Using Lua interpreter for code generation: /usr/bin/luajit
-- Using Lua compiler: /usr/bin/luajit -b -s %s -
-- Removing --sort-common from linker flags
-- main_lib props '/usr/include/luajit-2.1;/usr/include;/home/user/.cache/paru/clone/neovim-git/src/neovim/build/src/nvim/auto;/home/user/.cache/paru/clone/neovim-git/src/neovim/build/include;/home/user/.cache/paru/clone/neovim-git/src/neovim/build/cmake.config;/home/user/.cache/paru/clone/neovim-git/src/neovim/src'
-- nlua0 props '/usr/include/luajit-2.1;/home/user/.cache/paru/clone/neovim-git/src/neovim/src;/home/user/.cache/paru/clone/neovim-git/src/neovim/build/cmake.config;/home/user/.cache/paru/clone/neovim-git/src/neovim/build/include'
-- iconv props '/usr/include'
-- libuv props '/usr/include'
-- libvterm props '/usr/include'
-- msgpack props '/usr/include'
-- treesitter props '/usr/include'
-- unibilium props '/usr/include'
-- libintl props '/usr/include'
-- Configuring done (0.5s)
-- Generating done (0.2s)
-- Build files have been written to: /home/user/.cache/paru/clone/neovim-git/src/neovim/build
[  0%] Built target nvim_runtime_deps
[  7%] Built target nlua0
[  7%] Built target update_version_stamp
[  7%] Building C object src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nvim_bin.dir/os/signal.c.o
[  7%] Building C object src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nvim_bin.dir/os/stdpaths.c.o
[  7%] Building C object src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nvim_bin.dir/lua/treesitter.c.o
[  7%] Building C object src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nvim_bin.dir/os/process.c.o
[  7%] Building C object src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nvim_bin.dir/os/shell.c.o
[  7%] Building C object src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nvim_bin.dir/os/pty_process_unix.c.o
[  7%] Building C object src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nvim_bin.dir/os/time.c.o
[  7%] Building C object src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nvim_bin.dir/os/users.c.o
[  7%] Building C object src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nvim_bin.dir/path.c.o
[  7%] Building C object src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nvim_bin.dir/plines.c.o
[  7%] Building C object src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nvim_bin.dir/popupmenu.c.o
[  7%] Building C object src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nvim_bin.dir/profile.c.o
[ 15%] Building C object src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nvim_bin.dir/quickfix.c.o
/home/user/.cache/paru/clone/neovim-git/src/neovim/src/nvim/lua/treesitter.c: In function '__has_ancestor':
/home/user/.cache/paru/clone/neovim-git/src/neovim/src/nvim/lua/treesitter.c:1084:12: error: implicit declaration of function 'ts_node_child_containing_descendant'; did you mean 'node_child_containing_descendant'? [-Wimplicit-function-declaration]
 1084 |     node = ts_node_child_containing_descendant(node, descendant);
      |            ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
      |            node_child_containing_descendant
/home/user/.cache/paru/clone/neovim-git/src/neovim/src/nvim/lua/treesitter.c:1084:12: error: incompatible types when assigning to type 'TSNode' from type 'int'
/home/user/.cache/paru/clone/neovim-git/src/neovim/src/nvim/lua/treesitter.c: In function 'node_child_containing_descendant':
/home/user/.cache/paru/clone/neovim-git/src/neovim/src/nvim/lua/treesitter.c:1095:18: error: invalid initializer
 1095 |   TSNode child = ts_node_child_containing_descendant(node, descendant);
      |                  ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
make[2]: *** [src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nvim_bin.dir/build.make:3430: src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nvim_bin.dir/lua/treesitter.c.o] Error 1
make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/Makefile2:623: src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nvim_bin.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [Makefile:156: all] Error 2
```

I also have latest `treesitter-git` package installed and `treesitter-cli-git`

### Steps to reproduce

Install from master

### Expected behavior

Build and install neovim

### Neovim version (nvim -v)

neovim-git-0.11.0.r37.g14f9aacc9d

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

I don't know, only use neovim

### Operating system/version

Arch Linux x86_64 (kernel Linux 6.9.1)

### Terminal name/version

Not influent

### $TERM environment variable

Not influent

### Installation

Arch User Repository (AUR)

comment_data.body: Tree-sitter 0.22.6 is required. Make sure you have the proper dependencies installed. If in doubt, `make distclean`.

> Arch User Repository (AUR)

We don't maintain or support this. Issues like this should be reported there.

title: Unable to build from latest git
